snippet: Waste Connections said on Monday that it would buy R360 Environmental Solutions, an oil field treatment services company, for about $1.3 billion in cash, as it seeks to increase its toehold in the American energy boom.
abstract: Waste Connections said on Monday that it would buy R360 Environmental Solutions, an oil field treatment services company, for about $1.3 billion in cash, as it seeks to increase its toehold in the American energy boom.

headline.main: Waste Connections to Buy R360 for $1.3 Billion
